_comment: Use this as a reference/template for adding new entries. Copy the relevant section and fill in your data.
_note: Do NOT edit this file - it's for reference only. Edit the actual JSON files in this directory.

_project_template.title: Project Title
_project_template.summary: One or two sentence summary of the project
_project_template.role: Your Role (e.g., Full Stack Developer, Project Manager)
_project_template.problem: What problem did this project solve?
_project_template.solution: How did you approach and solve the problem?
_project_template.case_study_md:

- Responsibility 2

- **Backend**: Node.js, Express

- Feature 2

- Result 2

_skill_template.name: Skill Name
_skill_template.category: Frontend (or Backend, Project Management, Tools, Soft Skills)

_ai_prompt_example.prompt_for_ai:
Generate a JSON for a project called 'My App' built with React and Node.js. Use this exact structure:

{
  "id": "my-app",
  "title": "My App",
  "slug": "my-app",
  "summary": "A web application built with React and Node.js",
  "role": "Full Stack Developer",
  "problem": "Users needed a way to manage tasks",
  "solution": "Built a task management app with real-time updates",
  "case_study_md": "# My App\n\n**Full Stack Developer | 2024**\n\n## Overview\n\nA task management application...",
  "stack": ["React", "Node.js", "TypeScript"],
  "tags": ["Web", "Full-Stack"],
  "featured": true,
  "featured_order": 1,
  "status": "published",
  "media": []
}
